mapper.select: select * from (select p3.Zj_Abbr_Name Zj_Name ,nvl(tcf_amt,0) tcf_amt,nvl(tcf_amt_cha,0) tcf_amt_cha,nvl(tcf_amt_uncha,0) tcf_amt_uncha,nvl(tcf_amt_rate,1)tcf_amt_rate from (select B.ZJ as Zj_Name , count(*) tcf_amt, sum( case when a.xztc_amt >=50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_cha , sum( case when a.xztc_amt<50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_uncha, sum( case when a.xztc_amt >= 50 then 1 else 0 end )/count(*) tcf_amt_rate from XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL a left JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY b ON A.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME where cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and ( a.CDSC_NAME is null or a.CDSC_NAME <>'IPTV纯装宽带零月租_ZJ' ) and a.remark_info not like '%中电信宁波市场联〔2022〕41号%' and a.cacct_id not in ('2742039410352') and a.CDSC_NAME<>'201801融合套餐100M宽带包月30元（第二条宽带专用）（产品）_ZJ' group by B.ZJ)P right join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_PAR p3 on p.Zj_Name=p3.Zj_Abbr_Name order by p3.Zj_Abbr_Name desc) q3 union all select Zj_Name ,nvl(tcf_amt,0) tcf_amt,nvl(tcf_amt_cha,0) tcf_amt_cha,nvl(tcf_amt_uncha,0) tcf_amt_uncha,nvl(tcf_amt_rate,0)tcf_amt_rate from (select '鄞州宽带合计' as Zj_Name, count(*) tcf_amt, sum( case when a.xztc_amt>=50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_cha , sum( case when a.xztc_amt<50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_uncha, sum( case when a.xztc_amt>=50 then 1 else 0 end )/count(*) tcf_amt_rate from XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL a where cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and ( a.CDSC_NAME is null or a.CDSC_NAME<>'IPTV纯装宽带零月租_ZJ' ) and a.cacct_id not in ('2742039410352') and a.remark_info not like '%中电信宁波市场联〔2022〕41号%' and a.CDSC_NAME<>'201801融合套餐100M宽带包月30元（第二条宽带专用）（产品）_ZJ' ) Q

select * from (select p3.Zj_Abbr_Name Zj_Name ,nvl(tcf_amt,0) tcf_amt,nvl(tcf_amt_cha,0) tcf_amt_cha,nvl(tcf_amt_uncha,0) tcf_amt_uncha,nvl(tcf_amt_rate,1)tcf_amt_rate from ( select B.ZJ as Zj_Name ,count(*) tcf_amt,sum( case when a.khf_amt>=50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_cha ,sum( case when a.khf_amt<50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_uncha, sum( case when a.khf_amt>=50 then 1 else 0 end )/count(*) tcf_amt_rate from XFY_RPT_ITV_ORDER_DETAIL a left JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY b ON A.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=B.MKT_NAME where GROUP_VAL <> '酒店个性化高清分组' and cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and cpl_dt <= #{endDate} group by B.ZJ)P right join XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_PAR p3 on p.Zj_Name=p3.Zj_Abbr_Name order by p3.Zj_Abbr_Name desc) q3 union all select Zj_Name ,nvl(tcf_amt,0) tcf_amt,nvl(tcf_amt_cha,0) tcf_amt_cha,nvl(tcf_amt_uncha,0) tcf_amt_uncha,nvl(tcf_amt_rate,0)tcf_amt_rate from (select '鄞州ITV合计' Zj_Name , count(*) tcf_amt ,sum( case when a.khf_amt>=50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_cha , sum( case when a.khf_amt<50 then 1 else 0 end ) tcf_amt_uncha, sum( case when a.khf_amt>=50 then 1 else 0 end )/count(*) tcf_amt_rate from XFY_RPT_ITV_ORDER_DETAIL a where GROUP_VAL <> '酒店个性化高清分组' and cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and cpl_dt <= #{endDate}) Q

SELECT C.ZJ AS ZJ_AREA_NAME , b.ASSET_ROW_ID,b.CPL_DT,b.DATA_USER_NAME,b.STAT_NAME,b.SALES_DEPT_NAME,b.SALES_CHANNEL_NAME, b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME,b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID,b.CDSC_NAME,b.XZTC_AMT,b.KHF_AMT,b.CCUST_ID,b.WG_ID FROM XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL b LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY c ON B.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=c.MKT_NAME where b.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and b.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and ( b.CDSC_NAME is null or b.CDSC_NAME <>'IPTV纯装宽带零月租_ZJ' ) and b.CDSC_NAME<>'201801融合套餐100M宽带包月30元（第二条宽带专用）（产品）_ZJ' and b.remark_info not like '%中电信宁波市场联〔2022〕41号%' and b.cacct_id not in ('2742039410352') and b.xztc_amt<50 and C.ZJ in ( select D.zj_new from XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D where d.zj_old = #{zj_name} )

SELECT C.ZJ AS ZJ_AREA_NAME , b.ASSET_ROW_ID,b.CPL_DT,b.SALES_EMPLOYEE_NAME,b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID, b.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME,b.STAT_NAME,b.ACCS_NBR,b.SALES_DEPT_NAME,b.CCUST_NAME,b.DATA_USER_NAME,b.MKT_DEPT_ID,b.MKT_DEPT_NAME, b.DO_CDSC_NAME,b.WG_ID,b.WG_NAME,b.AGENT_POINT_ID,b.CCUST_ID FROM XFY_RPT_ITV_ORDER_DETAIL b LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_CDRY c ON B.MKT_EMPLOYEE_ID=c.MKT_NAME where b.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and b.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} and b.GROUP_VAL <> '酒店个性化高清分组' and b.khf_amt<50 and C.ZJ in ( select D.zj_new from XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON D where d.zj_old = #{zj_name} )
